rei shinoda <shinoda_rei_goku@...>  wrote:                                 

   Why did Yamanami Keisuke try to leave Shinsengumi ?
   Was it JUST b'coz misunderstnding ?

*-*-*
I don't think it was ever know what Yamanami's reasons for trying to leave were.   I've read/heard many diffrent reasons, the most popular is that he wasn't happy with the way the Shinsengumi was heading.   He disagreed with many of Kondou's views and ways of doing things.    The Shinsengumi did not hold the same values (I guess you can say) from when they had first began and this seemed to trouble him.

Thats pretty much all I know it a nutshell ^^;

-Bunneh
